summary: Backend-only testing of Gamma Match SWR/Smith Chart physics unification. All 13 tests passed. The physics model correctly derives SWR from complex impedance using reflection coefficient Γ = (Z_final - Z0)/(Z_final + Z0), SWR = (1+|Γ|)/(1-|Γ|). Smith Chart and SWR now use unified physics model.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Gamma match physics unification tests added. Key test parameters: bar_pos=13, element_gap=10 produce optimal SWR~1.01 with Z~50+j0. Physics fields in matching_info: z_matched_r, z_matched_x, x_stub, x_cap, net_reactance, z0_gamma, reflection_coefficient. All feed types (gamma, hairpin, direct) work correctly.
